--- In gladiator@y..., "dph_of_rules" <dph_of_rules@y...> wrote:
> --- In gladiator@y..., "m_yohalem2002" <zqca@d...> wrote:
> > Okay, I figured out how to modify text, but I have a few 
questions:
> > 
> > 1) Is there any quick way to clear the entire description?
> 
> Yes, you can clear the entire population really quickly. 
> Unfortunately, that also clears everything but the background.  
Press 
> Control D to do that.

Note: description, not population.  You know, the briefing text at 
the start?

 
> Honestly, I would rather people work on the "50 Project" than start 
> on a brand new set on their own.  I almost have the entire 
storyline 
> ready (I plan on finishing within an hour.).

But the whole fun is coming up with your own story, isn't it?

- Mark
